Welcome To the Navyodaya Vidhya Mandir

Where Young Minds Blossom and Dreams Take Flight

Experience our nurturing environment, personalized coaching, and dedicated team guiding young minds toward academic excellence and personal growth.

Our Services

Class 1th to 8th Coaching Classes

A one-year course for students in 8th standard that covers all Subjects of CBSE/IGCSE/IB/GB ENGLISH MEDIUM curriculum in Maths, Science, English, Social Studies and other subjects.

Class 9th Coaching Classes

A one-year course for students in 9th standard that covers the Maths & Science of State board/CBSE/NCERT curriculum.

Children Deserve Bright Future

Our Benifits

Experience a comprehensive and enriching educational journey at NVM Foundation

Smart Classes

Step into the future of education with our smart class technology.Our smart class technology ensures an immersive and dynamic learning environment that stimulates curiosity and fosters critical thinking skills.

Flipped Classroom

Experience a revolutionary approach to learning with our flipped classroom model.Flipped Classroom will be disigned so that classroom time will be utilized for more meaningfull activites such as group discussions and problem solving

Personalized Learning

Embrace personalized learning tailored to your individual needs and learning style. Our instructors are committed to understanding your strengths, weaknesses, and goals to create a customized learning experience that maximizes your potential.

Expert Faculty

Learn from the best with our team of expert faculty members who bring a wealth of knowledge, experience, and passion to the classroom. Our instructors are leaders in their fields, dedicated to delivering high-quality instruction, mentorship, and support to help you succeed.

Individualized Attention

Benefit from personalized attention and support from our dedicated team of educators. We understand that every student has unique learning needs and preferences. Our teachers tailor their instruction to accommodate diverse learning styles, ensuring that each student receives the guidance and assistance they need to thrive academically.

Parent Engagement

Partner with parents to support student learning and development. We believe in the importance of strong home-school partnerships in promoting student success. Regular communication, parent-teacher conferences, and family engagement events create a supportive network that fosters academic achievement and well-being.
